title: MeCsc
author: MeCsc
content: When taking this quiz :[Quiz 2022] History of Bitcoin and Bitcointalk ðŸš©, I failed a question about Epochtalk and the correction showed I tried joining the server but it shows: Quote This link is invalid or has Expired I would like to know if the Bitcointalk discord server still exists?Also who created Coinbistro andÂ  what is the use? because the information I have about it is vague but I do know it involves this Forum and I tried Asking ChatGpt here was the reply

comments.author: UchihaSarada
comments.body: Why ChatGPT?It exists and alive.Bitcointalk Halving Party - Discord serverInvite link for Bitcointalk Discord: https://discord.gg/ahgHyku

comments.author: MeCsc
comments.body: Quote from: UchihaSarada on April 04, 2023, 04:26:29 PMWhy ChatGPT?Wanted to know what coinbistro was about? Quote from: UchihaSarada on April 04, 2023, 04:26:29 PMIt exists and alive.Bitcointalk Halving Party - Discord server (https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5247383.0)Invite link for Bitcointalk Discord: https://discord.gg/ahgHykuThanks for this but this is not the discord server, I ask about an Official discord server.

comments.author: light_warrior
comments.body: Quote from: MeCsc on April 04, 2023, 03:04:16 PMAlso who created Coinbistro and Â what is the use?Coinbistro was created to test the functionality of the new engine for our forum (Epochtalk). There you can find various bugs and write about them there. By the way, you can register there and join the testing of the future bitcointalk engine.Here's a link to the test forum https://coinbistro.com/And here's the ANN https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5158825.0

comments.author: joker_josue
comments.body: Quote from: MeCsc on April 04, 2023, 05:50:35 PMThanks for this but this is not the discord server, I ask about an Official discord server. No longer exists!I'm not sure, but between 2015 and 2017 there was some involvement on the part of the administration in managing communication platforms other than Bitcointalk. But, in 2017 they decided that this would no longer make sense and so they stopped using other social networks. I am not now sure of the dates and all the details.Personally I think it's good, since the forum is already a means of communication, it doesn't need other means for this purpose.

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: MeCsc on April 04, 2023, 05:50:35 PMThanks for this but this is not the discord server, I ask about an Official discord server. He gave you the corect link, that's the only bitcointalk Discord server and if you checked it you would see that one of the bitcointalk administrators (Cyrus) created it. Me and bunch of other members are there, but its not as active as it used to be.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Quote from: joker_josue on April 04, 2023, 07:20:21 PMQuote from: MeCsc on April 04, 2023, 05:50:35 PMThanks for this but this is not the discord server, I ask about an Official discord server. No longer exists!I'm not sure, but between 2015 and 2017 there was some involvement on the part of the administration in managing communication platforms other than Bitcointalk. But, in 2017 they decided that this would no longer make sense and so they stopped using other social networks. I am not now sure of the dates and all the details.Personally I think it's good, since the forum is already a means of communication, it doesn't need other means for this purpose.I think you missed something broThere is currently a discord server dubbed as the Unofficial Bitcointalk discord server that was set up by Cyrus sometime around 2020 prior to the bitcoin halving event. It's not so active, but you will find some Bitcointalk members there as well.Check this replyMy bad, never mind.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: LOL, asking chatGPT anything is becoming a trend. While you can google it and you will get answers, if there is a discord server, you can also find the link in google. But chatGPT won't give you any link to check just some texts in reply. Quote from: MeCsc on April 04, 2023, 05:50:35 PMThanks for this but this is not the discord server, I ask about an Official discord server. There is not any official discord server for bitcointalk and I don't think you will get any in future.
